mapper.select: SELECT id, operator, operation_type AS operationType, target_table AS targetTable, target_id AS targetId, content, created_at AS createTime FROM studentms.operation_log ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studentms.operation_log (operator, operation_type, target_table, target_id, content, created_at) VALUES (#{log.operator}, #{log.operationType}, #{log.targetTable}, #{log.targetId}, #{log.content}, #{log.createTime})
